events.title: a Secunda CTL site is attacked, and Patrick Chamusso is wrongly accused of the attack

movie.title: Catch a Fire
movie.plot: A political thriller: the real-life story of a South African hero's journey to freedom. In the country's turbulent and divided times in the 1980s, Patrick Chamusso is an oil refinery foreman and soccer coach who is apolitical - until he and his wife Precious are jailed. Patrick is stunned into action against the country's oppressive reigning system, even as police Colonel Nic Vos further insinuates himself into the Chamussos' lives.

events.title: a group of friends' annual month long game of tag ends

movie.title: Tag
movie.plot: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.
